name: Tammwel, Inc
description: Developer of a loan comparison platform intended to help customers and clients find financial offers. The company's platform offers quotes for financing automobiles, real estate, and personal loans and also features tools for tracking loan reimbursement and payments, enabling loan seekers to connect with commercial loan providers.
